author: ktf
body: This is a rebase of #1404 by @VinInn. I cleaned up the history as requested by @slava77 and removed one auto statement, to avoid deliberately breaking PFRootEvent. PFRootEvent itself, as agreed (I think) still will be moved out from release, but will not be deliberately broken.
title: CaloTowers speedup (rebase of #1404)
